Novosibirsk Ubuntu Team is a group of Ubuntu-involved persons. Founded since May 2009.

=== Key details ===
* Date - February 21, 2010
* Team Contact - Denis Matveyev <shi-hulud at ngs dot ru>
* Membership - 106 as of February 2010
* Mailing List - ubuntu-ru-loco-nsk@lists.launchpad.net subscribe at https://launchpad.net/~ubuntu-ru-loco-nsk for team members.
* Jabber conference - linuxnsk@conference.sibnsk.net
* Web site - http://nsk.ubuntu.ru/
* Launchpad - https://launchpad.net/~ubuntu-ru
=== Common purposes in Novosibirsk and region ===
* Supporting Linux users.
* Forwarding Ubuntu Linux into every activity sphere.
* Exchanging experience and resource between like-minders.
* Coordinating Ubuntu Linux societies in Novosibirsk.
* Distributing Ubuntu Linux on physical medium.
=== Experience ===
* Ubuntu Install Fest June 4, 2009.
* Round-table discussion about Linux and Free Software. September 11, 2009.
* Software Freedom Day. September 19, 2009.
* Internet Cafe in ITE Siberian Fair on STROISIB: DESIGNING, CONSTRUCTION, RECONSTRUCTION International construction and architecture exhibition.
* Weekly meetings since May 2009.
